description: Manages all Pay-As-You-Go licenses for an Azure Arc-Enabled Server.

commands.name: az connectedmachine license-profile create
commands.summary: Create operation to create a license profile.
commands.syntax:
az connectedmachine license-profile create --machine-name
                                           --resource-group
                                           [--assigned-license]
                                           [--location]
                                           [--no-wait {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                                           [--product-features]
                                           [--product-type {WindowsIoTEnterprise, WindowsServer}]
                                           [--software-assurance {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                                           [--subscription-status {Disabled, Disabling, Enabled, Enabling, Failed, Unknown}]
                                           [--tags]
examples: az connectedmachine license-profile create --resource-group myRg --machine-name myMachine --location eastus --subscription-status Enabled --product-type WindowsServer --product-features "[{name:Hotpatch,subscription-status:Enabled}]"

commands.name: az connectedmachine license-profile delete
commands.summary: Delete operation to delete a license profile.
commands.syntax:
az connectedmachine license-profile delete [--ids]
                                           [--machine-name]
                                           [--no-wait {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                                           [--resource-group]
                                           [--subscription]
                                           [--yes]
examples: az connectedmachine license-profile delete --resource-group myResourceGroup --machine-name myMachine

commands.name: az connectedmachine license-profile list
commands.summary: List operation to get all license profiles of a non-Azure machine.
examples: az connectedmachine license-profile list --resource-group myResourceGroup --machine-name myMachine

commands.name: az connectedmachine license-profile show
commands.summary: Get information about the view of a license profile.
examples: az connectedmachine license-profile show --resource-group myResourceGroup --machine-name myMachine

commands.name: az connectedmachine license-profile update
commands.summary: Update operation to update a license profile.
commands.syntax:
az connectedmachine license-profile update [--add]
                                           [--assigned-license]
                                           [--force-string {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                                           [--ids]
                                           [--machine-name]
                                           [--no-wait {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                                           [--product-features]
                                           [--product-type {WindowsIoTEnterprise, WindowsServer}]
                                           [--remove]
                                           [--resource-group]
                                           [--set]
                                           [--software-assurance {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                                           [--subscription]
                                           [--subscription-status {Disabled, Disabling, Enabled, Enabling, Failed, Unknown}]
                                           [--tags]
examples: az connectedmachine license-profile udpate --resource-group myRg --machine-name myMachine --location eastus --subscription-status Enabled --product-type WindowsServer --product-features "[{name:Hotpatch,subscription-status:Enabled}]"

commands.name: az connectedmachine license-profile wait
commands.summary: Place the CLI in a waiting state until a condition is met.
